import React from "react" import SignUpInput from "../SignUpInput" import { useState } from "react" import $ from "jquery" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { property_info } from "../CreatePropertyForm" const EditPropertyForm = () => { const [propertyName, setPropertyName] = useState("") const [city, setCity] = useState("") const [country, setCountry] = useState("") const [address, setAddress] = useState("") const [numOfGuests, setNumOfGuests] = useState("") const [numOfBeds, setNumOfBeds] = useState("") const [propertyType, setPropertyType] = useState("") return <>
property_info(propertyName, city, country, address, numOfGuests, numOfBeds, propertyType)} readOnly/>

} export default EditPropertyForm
